outputs.output_descr: Responding to the immediate effects of the crisis, while at the same time committing to the long-term interventions to create inclusive markets and unleashing the entrepreneurial potential of the region. The goal of the project was to support entrepreneurs in five municipalities in the North of Montenegro with good business ideas and support for those who wanted to start their own business, with specific emphasis on women entrepreneurs. The support consisted of trainings, education, grants ranging between €3,000.00 and 8,000, and networking support.  Priority was not necessarily given to the poorest and most vulnerable, but to those with the best business plans, and the most extensive and inclusive supply chains  those, in other words, who had the greatest potential to impact on the region's economy.

project_descr: Conflict prevention through targeted economic development.
